isis.stitle: SPICER 14-INCH (356 MM) AND 15 1/2-INCH (394 MM) TWO-PLATE, PULL-TYPE CLUTCH - CLEAN AND INSPECT - CLEAN

svcsubproc.title: Clutch Lining Material

warning.para: Avoid breathing clutch lining fiber dust as it may be hazardous to your health.

svcsubproc.para: Persons who handle clutch linings should follow the precautions outlined.

step1.para: Always wear a respirator approved by NIOSH or MSHA during all service procedures.
NEVER use compressed air or dry brushing to clean clutch parts or assemblies.

Clean parts and assemblies in the open air. Use an industrial vacuum cleaner with an HEPA filter system to clean dust from the parts. After using the vacuum, remove any remaining dust with a rag soaked in water and wrung until nearly dry.
